title: Cille Cyklus
subtitle: Interactive storytelling about the menstrual cycle
description: Digital. storytelling project about the menstrual cycle, focusing on emotions, breaking taboos and providing information about menstruation through interactive storytelling.
credits: Digital storytelling, interaction design, illustration, animation, javascript

title: Zero Buzz
subtitle: Non alcoholic beer
description: branding and website for a fictional non-alcoholic beer. The project included designing the beer can, creating a logo, and developing a website to promote the product.
credits: Handdrawn animation, Custom beer designer, branding, webdesign, infographic,

title: Radar live
subtitle: Redesigning a concert venue
description: A parallax scrolling site for the concert venue radar live in Aarhus, Denmark.
